topic.body: I'm writing a general deep learning library for AI research/product.   Any one interested?

topic.title: principle of Zeronet
topic.body: A Daemon is started to fetch data(site list, site data) from peers.  Also there is a http server listening on local port 43110, when you input http://127.0.0.1:43110 in the address bar of browser, local http server send data to browser requested.
